title: Turn off Intl Player Creation flow for Clubs
custom_steps: Due to new business process from IPL, Clubs should no longer be able to create intl amateur players in ebis.

title: DPL - EBIS Name Pronunciation
As a BOC Admin, I want attaching a PTBNL AA to a transaction to update the Transaction Payment tracker
As a BOC R4 Draft Admin, I want a new Insufficient Draft Status
custom_steps:
Business Value: 

* A player who has not updated information for the current Draft year, and whose current information cannot be verified using available resources.  Admins would like to separate these player out from the typical Not Eligibles.

AC:

* There will be a new â€˜Insufficientâ€™ R4 Draft Status for domestic amateur players
* This new status will work the same as Not Eligible
* If a player has a draft status of Insufficient, they will not appear in the Selectable Player widget and will not be draftable
* The Domestic Amateur Player widget will be updated to accommodate the new status and allow Admins to manually select this status

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see Recent Outright column on the Player Information Summary report
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a new "Recent Outright" column added to the MJ Roster Widget report
 - It will appear after the "Current Year Options"
 - The column will show the date of the player's most recent outright, in the current season.  If the player has not had an outright in the current season, the field will be blank.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a Current Year Options column on the Player Information Summary Report
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a new "Current Yr Options" column added to the Player Information Summary report
 - It will appear after the "Options Used" column and before the "Prior Outright" column
 - The column will show the value displayed in the 'Current Year Options' field on the player's profile (in the header) and the roster widgets

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a NOD on the Transfer to MN Full-Season IL Tx
custom_steps:
Reqs: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786638/MN+Place+on+60+Day+DL+NOD+Layout|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786638/MN+Place+on+60+Day+DL+NOD+Layout]

AC:

* The Transfer to MN Full-Season IL transaction will have a new Notice of Disposition
* The new NOD will match the format/structure of the attached â€œ60-Day ILâ€� letter
** â€œ60-Day Injured Listâ€� will be replaced with â€œFull-Season Injured Listâ€�
* The new letter will be available from the transaction and be populated with the appropriate information
* The Blank Notice of Disposition report will also be updated to include Full-Season Injured List
* This story will cover esign

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an SFD on the Transfer to MN Full-Season IL Tx
custom_steps:
The Full-Seaion IL Transaction will must have an accompanying SFD,.

MJ Data Discovery:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL|smart-link] 

MJ 60-Day IL SFD:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786414/MJ+SFD+-+Place+on+10+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL+Layout|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786414/MJ+SFD+-+Place+on+10+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL+Layout|smart-link] 

Clipboard Notifications:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard|smart-link] 

AC:

* There will be a new SFD created for Transfer to MN Full-Season IL tx
* There will be a â€œ Received SFDâ€� checkbox added to the transaction
** The box will be disabled for Club users if an attachment with a label of "Standard Form of Diagnosis" is not attached.
* A notification will be generated when a SFD is attached after the TX has been submitted (Message #6)
* If 3 days have passed since the TX was submitted w/o a SFD being submitted, a notification will be generated  (Message #7)
* This story will cover esign

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an SFD on the MN Full-Season IL Placement
custom_steps:
The Full-Seaion IL Transaction will must have an accompanying SFD,.

MJ Data Discovery:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL|smart-link]

title: As an Intl Admin, I want profiles originating in IPL to always be the master copy when merging within ebis
custom_steps:
Currently, when merging intl ama profiles in ebis, the user may pick which profile is the master copy.

AC:
 - When merging an ebis profile with a profile originating in IPL, the user will not be given the option to choose which profile is the master
 - ebis will always choose the IPL profile as the master
 - If there is a Drug Test Request, investigation, contract history, or scouting reports attached to the ebis profile, they will be moved to the IPL profile
 - Any profile originating in AMT will have the new IPL ID reflected in AMT

title: As a User, I want to see Current Year Options Column on the MN Roster Widget
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a new "Current Yr Options" column added to the MN Roster Widget
 - It will appear after the "Domestic Reserve" column
 - The column will show the value displayed in the 'Current Year Options' field on the player's profile (in the header)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a Current Year Options column on the MJ Roster Widget
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a new "Current Yr Options" column added to the MJ Roster Widget
 - It will appear after the "Options Used" column and before the "Elig Recall Date" column
 - The column will show the value displayed in the 'Current Year Options' field on the player's profile (in the header)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a warning on submission of a player's 4th or higher option
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a user clicks submits on an optional assignment that is a playerâ€™s 4th or higher in-season option, the system will return the following warning message:
** Text: â€œPlayer is approaching the limit for permitted optional assignments in \[Current Season Year].Â  Please contact the BOC to confirm total option count."
** Buttons: Continue, Back
* The message will fire for both BOC and Club Users

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a clipboard flag when a player is approaching their in-season option limit
custom_steps:
AC
 1. When a player's 4th or higher in-season option is submitted, the BOC's Pending Approvals clipboard will display an orange flag
 2. Clicking the flag will display the following message:
  -- "Player is approaching the limit for permitted optional assignments in [Current Season Year]."

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Transfer players from the COVID IL (Minor)
custom_steps:
Description: Currently, COVID IL is not a valid roster status for transfers to the other ILs

AC:

* Players currently on the COVID IL (Minor)/Rehab from COVID IL may be transferred to the 60-Day IL (Minor)
* Players currently on the COVID IL (Minor)/Rehab from COVID IL may be transferred to the Full-Season IL (Minor)
* Time served on the COVID IL will count toward the required minimums of those lists

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Transfer players from the COVID IL (Major)
custom_steps:
Description: Currently, COVID IL is not a valid roster status for transfers to the other ILs

AC:

* Players currently on the COVID IL (Major) may be transferred to the 10-Day IL (Major)
* Players currently on the COVID IL (Major) may be transferred to the 15-Day IL (Major)
* Players currently on the COVID IL (Major) may be transferred to the 60-Day IL (Major)
* Time served on the COVID IL will count toward the required minimums of those lists

title: INC0191411 - Waiver Bulletins - Parker Merkel
custom_steps:
Received from: [jeff.pfeifer@mlb.com|mailto:jeff.pfeifer@mlb.com]
Recipients: [ebissupport@mlb.com|mailto:ebissupport@mlb.com][,Garrett.Horan@mlb.com|mailto:,Garrett.Horan@mlb.com][,anthony.montes@mlb.com|mailto:,anthony.montes@mlb.com]

OAK entered an OR waiver request for Parker Merkel at 10:35 pm on 6/5.  That request was for the 6/7 bulletin.  The next morning, OAK entered another OR waiver request for Merkel at 11:18 am on 6/6.  That request was for the 6/6 bulletin.  The 6/6 bulletin was sent successfully yesterday, but the Merkel OR request for 6/7 remains on todayâ€™s bulletin.  Wanted to show you this before we deleted that entry.

Can we get some logic in place where a Club can not enter the same same type of waiver request (OR or UR) after that request has already been submitted?

Additionally, can we eliminate the ability for a Club to request any waiver for a day other than for the next scheduled bulletin?  All requests submitted should be for the next bulletin to be sent.  Between 2 pm ET Monday and 1:59 pm Tuesday, all waiver requests that are entered are for that Tuesdayâ€™ bulletin.  Clubs should not be able to enter a waiver request during that time for any bulletin other than Tuesdayâ€™s.

Thanks

title: As a UEC Admin, I want certain fields on an Employee Request to be editable after the request has expired
custom_steps:
AC:

* After an approved request expires, the inquiring club will continue to be able to edit the Resolution dropdown
* All 4 options will be available:
** Position Accepted
** Position Declined
** Position Not Offered
** Request Extension
* After an approved extension request expires, the inquiring club will be able to enter a resolution:
** Position Accepted
** Position Declined
** Position Not Offered

title: As a UEC Admin, I want a to be able to reverse the status of a UEC
custom_steps:
AC:

* BOC UEC Admins will see a new Reverse button when viewing or editing a UEC
* Clicking this button will return a modal prompting the user to confirm their action:
** Text: â€œThis action will return the employeeâ€™s contract to \[STATE] state. Do you wish to continue?â€�
** Buttons: Continue, Back
* Clicking Back will dismiss the modal
* Clicking Continue will move the contract back to itâ€™s previous state
* -This will also reverse any associated transactions (if any had been created) as well as any downstream effects-

EDIT: removed last AC, we wonâ€™t touch transactions on reversal

 - The Spreadsheet upload button on the Club Reg List widget will no longer be available

title: As a System Admin, I want to see refresh buttons on the club and player esign widgets
custom_steps:
Add a 'refresh' button to the esign widgets that will call adobe to check in on the signing status and update if necessary.

This will allow the club user to move it along if they know its signed.

title: Update PIEF List Thresholds
custom_steps: Reference Email from Rebecca on 11.22.21

title: INC0179369 - As a MNC Admin, I want Date to be required on the Life Insurance Consent Form to be required if the player signs the form
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player signs the Life Insurance Consent form, the date field will become required

NOTE: If we are not able to have conditionally required fields in esign, we should explore options to avoid having players submit signed forms with a blank date (this renders them invalid and the entire contract needs to be esigned again)
  -- Other options may include populating it with the MNC Signing Date

title: Transfer to the Full Season IL (Minor) fields not working
custom_steps:
A Transfer to the Full Season IL does not give you the ability to utilize these drop downs when you click “new Injury”.  The drop down for Diagnosis Description and Body Part Detail are not functioning

Club are not able to update injuries if they click “New Injury”

title: MN 60-Day IL Org Limit Should Not Include Players In DSL
custom_steps:
Related to PIVOTAL-1165: As a User, I want Orgs to be prevented from having more than 15 players on the MN 60-Day IL at the same timeDONE 

 

Current: the MN 60-Day IL count includes players playing in the DSL.

Expected: the MN 60-Day IL count should only include Domestic players counting towards the Org wide 180.

title: Corrections Needed for Injured List Logic
custom_steps:
COVID IL needs to drop the check for any number of players, there should be no limit to the number of players on the COVID IL

Full-Season IL needs its own constant, it should not be sharing limits with another IL

Full Sesaon IL needs to ignore DSL players, should only count Domestic players (who count towards the 180)

Ideally, instead of using a query to get the current counts and limits, we put this information into the ORG_ROSTER_INFO_VIEW

title: Remove Limit for Full-Season IL
custom_steps:
Related to PIVOTAL-1160: As a User, I want Orgs to be prevented from having more than 15 players on the Full-Season IL at the same timeDONE 

 

AC:

There is no Full-Season IL limit in place for 2022

This limit should be removed for this year, but we should be able to easily add it back/configure it for future years
